answerText: David George Joseph Malouf[10] This author from the same country as David Malouf wrote The Chant of Jimmie Blacksmith and wrote a historical novel about Oskar, a businessman who saves the Polish from Nazi persecution.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 14 | 17 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The protagonist of a novel by this author worked as a rat catcher for a British ship before being taken in by native islanders after being abandoned. [10] Name this author who created Gemmy Fairley, a boy who finds support in Jock McIvor's family despite the rest of the community's distaste for him. This author also wrote Ransom and The Great World.
